wrongNetwork: You are on the wrong network
installWeb3MobileBrowser: Please visit us from a web3-enabled mobile browser such as Trust Wallet or Coinbase Wallet.
betaWarning: This project is in beta. Use at your own risk.
searchOrPaste: Search Token Name, Symbol, or Address
unknownError: Oops! An unknown error occurred. Please refresh the page, or visit from another browser or device.
enterValueCont: Enter a {{ missingCurrencyValue }} value to continue.
noRecipient: Enter a wallet address to send to.
invalidRecipient: Please enter a valid wallet address recipient.
mustBeETH: One of the input must be ETH.
enterCurrencyOrLabelCont: Enter a {{ inputCurrency }} or {{ label }} value to continue.
totalSupplyIs: Current total supply of liquidity tokens is
youAreSettingExRate: You are setting the initial exchange rate to
totalSupplyIs0: Current total supply of liquidity tokens is 0.
tokenWorth: At current exchange rate, each pool token is worth
firstLiquidity: You are the first person to add liquidity!
initialExchangeRate: The initial exchange rate will be set based on your deposits. Please make sure that your ETH and {{ label }} deposits have the same fiat value.
enterLabelCont: Enter a {{ label }} value to continue.
label: Label
name: Name
enterTokenCont: Enter a token address to continue
brokenToken: The selected token is not compatible with Uniswap V1. Adding liquidity will result in locked funds.
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.

liquidity.firstProviderWarning: You are the first liquidity provider.
liquidity.setInitialPriceWarning: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
liquidity.clickSupplyWarning: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
liquidity.addTooltip: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
liquidity.removeTooltip: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
liquidity.confirmSupplyWarning: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{percent}} your transaction will revert.
liquidity.rewardDesc: Liquidity providers earn a 0.3% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.

transaction.confirmInWallet: Confirm this transaction in your wallet

findPage.title: Import Pool
findPage.titleTooltip: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
findPage.connectWalletGuide: Connect to a wallet to find pools
findPage.selectTokenGuilde: Select a token to find your liquidity

swapPage.title: Swap
swapPage.findTokenHelpTooltip: Import any token into your list by pasting the token address into the search field.
swapPage.selectTokenTooltip: Find a token by searching for its name or symbol or by pasting its address below.
swapPage.commonBasesTooltop: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
swapPage.revertTransactionTooltip: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
swapPage.priceImpactTooltip: The difference between the market price and your price due to trade size.
swapPage.liquidityProviderFeeTooltip: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive.
swapPage.swapModalDescBuy: Output is estimated. You will receive at least

poolPage.yourLiquidityTooltip: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens that represent your share. If you don’t see a pool you joined in this list, try importing a pool below.
poolPage.connectToWallet: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
poolPage.withoutPool: Don't see a pool you joined?
poolPage.betterPrice: There is a better price for this trade on
poolPage.routingTooltip: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.

setting.toggleExpertModeTooltip: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
setting.slippageToleranceTooltip: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
setting.transactionDeadlineTooltip: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
setting.expertModeWarning: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
setting.onlyUseWarning: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
setting.confirmExpertWarning: Please type the word 'confirm' to enable expert mode.

tokenList.guide: Uniswap now supports token lists. You can add your own custom lists via IPFS, HTTPS and ENS
tokenList.removeConfirm: Please confirm you would like to remove this list by typing REMOVE
tokenList.addListTooltip: Token lists are an open specification for lists of ERC20 tokens. You can use any token list by entering its URL below. Beware that third party token lists can contain fake or malicious ERC20 tokens.

account.title: Account
account.installMetamask: Please visit us after installing Metamask on Chrome or Brave.

earnPage.miningAlertDesc: Deposit your Liquidity Provider tokens to receive UNI, the Uniswap protocol governance token.

votePage.title: Vote
votePage.uniswapGovernanceDesc: UNI tokens represent voting shares in Uniswap governance. You can vote on each proposal yourself or delegate your votes to a third party.
votePage.proposalsSectionDesc: Proposals submitted by community members will appear here.
votePage.proposalsSectionHint: A minimum threshhold of 1% of the total UNI supply is required to submit proposals
